ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We made your sleep a break.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And made sleep for you to rest,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and made your sleep a means of repose,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: made sleep for you to rest,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And made your sleep a rest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We have made your sleep as a thing for rest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We made your sleep to be rest (to you),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We appointed your sleep for a rest;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And have appointed your sleep for repose,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and gave you repose in sleep,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We have made your sleep as a rest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and make your sleep for rest?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And made your sleep for rest,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And have made your sleep as a thing for rest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and We made your sleep a rest,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And made your sleep for rest?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And made your sleep [a means for] rest
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:9] and made your sleep for rest?, repose for your bodies,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And have appointed your sleep for repose) a repose for your bodies; and it is said this means: nice and beautiful,
